plot: Two friends meet after a long time to play a game called 'Around the world'. Soon they'll realize that a friends' meeting hides too many secrets.
title: La bombilla
plot_es: Two friends meet after a long time to play a game called 'Around the world'. Soon they'll realize that a friends' meeting hides too many secrets.
